availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James C. Brookover (Maysville, Kentucky, grocery merchant)

body.p: Maysville, Kentucky, grocery merchant. Ohio native. Son of Richard Brookover and Isabell Brookover. Married to Rachel Brookover. Father of Henry Brookover. Grocery merchant in Maysville, Kentucky, in 1850. Grocer in Maysville in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, District 2, p. 108A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, p. 304.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Mason County, KY, October 1863, p. 12.
"James C. Brookover (1827-1866)," Find A Grave, Memorial #128439900, accessed November 13, 2017, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/128439900/james-c.-brookover.
